verses.verse: <S%H7971>Send<s%> the [tribute] <S%H3733>lamb<s%> to the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> From <S%H5554>Sela<s%> by way of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Then, like <S%H5074>fleeing<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> [or] <S%H7971>scattered<s%> <S%H7064>nestlings,<s%> The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be at the <S%H9278>fords<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H935>"Give<s%> [us] <S%H6098>advice,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6415>decision;<s%> <S%H7896>Cast<s%> your <S%H6738>shadow<s%> like <S%H3915>night<s%> at <S%H8432>high<s%> <S%H6672>noon;<s%> <S%H5641>Hide<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts,<s%> do not <S%H1540>betray<s%> the <S%H5074>fugitive.<s%>

"Let the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H1481>stay<s%> with you; Be a <S%H5643>hiding<s%> <S%H5643>place<s%> to them from the <S%H7703>destroyer.<s%>" For the <S%H9283>extortioner<s%> has <S%H656>come<s%> to an <S%H656>end,<s%> <S%H7701>destruction<s%> has <S%H3615>ceased,<s%> <S%H7429>Oppressors<s%> have <S%H8552>completely<s%> [disappeared] from the <S%H776>land.<s%>

A <S%H3678>throne<s%> will even be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And a <S%H8199>judge<s%> will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on it in <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> Moreover, he will <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> And be <S%H4106>prompt<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> an <S%H3966>excessive<s%> <S%H1343>pride;<s%> [Even] of his <S%H1346>arrogance,<s%> <S%H1347>pride,<s%> and <S%H5678>fury;<s%> His <S%H907>idle<s%> <S%H907>boasts<s%> are <S%H3808>false.<s%> <S%H3653><s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H3213>wail;<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H3213>wail.<s%> You shall <S%H1897>moan<s%> for the <S%H809>raisin<s%> <S%H809>cakes<s%> of Kir-hareseth As those <S%H9328>who<s%> are <S%H389>utterly<s%> <S%H9328>stricken.<s%>

For the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> have <S%H535>withered,<s%> the <S%H1612>vines<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%> [as well]; The <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H1986>trampled<s%> <S%H1986>down<s%> its <S%H8291>choice<s%> <S%H8291>clusters<s%> Which <S%H5060>reached<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> [and] <S%H8582>wandered<s%> to the <S%H4057>deserts;<s%> Its <S%H7976>tendrils<s%> <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves out [and] <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H1065>bitterly<s%> for <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> for the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah;<s%> I will <S%H7301>drench<s%> you with my <S%H1832>tears,<s%> O <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh;<s%> For the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5307>away.<s%>

And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>joy<s%> are <S%H622>taken<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> from the <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> <S%H3759>field;<s%> In the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> also there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7442>cries<s%> of <S%H7442>joy<s%> or <S%H7321>jubilant<s%> <S%H7321>shouting,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H1869>treader<s%> <S%H1869>treads<s%> out <S%H3196>wine<s%> in the <S%H3342>presses,<s%> [For] I have made the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> to <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H4578>heart<s%> <S%H1993>intones<s%> like a <S%H3658>harp<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> And my <S%H7130>inward<s%> <S%H7130>feelings<s%> for Kir-hareseth.

So it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7200>presents<s%> himself, <S%H3588>When<s%> he <S%H3811>wearies<s%> himself upon [his] <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place,<s%> And <S%H935>comes<s%> to his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H6419>pray,<s%> That he will not <S%H3201>prevail.<s%>

But <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> as a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%> would <S%H8141>count<s%> them, the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will be <S%H7034>degraded<s%> along with <S%H3605>all<s%> [his] <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>population,<s%> and [his] <S%H7605>remnant<s%> will be <S%H4213>very<s%> <S%H4592>small<s%> [and] <S%H3808>impotent.<s%> <S%H3524><s%>"
